>
[Overloaded Brain Grenade](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1462)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Fire" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=72" />
<trait label="Mental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=106" />
<trait label="Splash" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=150" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Pathfinder Special: Fumbus](/Sources.aspx?ID=105)

**Price** 200 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 2 hands

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Two Actions" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

It's possible for a desperate alchemist to rig the brain container of a defeated alchemical golem to create a volatile (if unusual) explosive. You throw the grenade up to 60 feet, and it explodes, dealing 3d6 fire damage and 3d6 mental damage in a 10-foot burst (DC 27 basic Reflex save). On a critical failure, a creature takes 2d6 persistent fire damage.

**Craft Requirements** Supply a brain case harvested from [alchemical golem](/Monsters.aspx?ID=239)

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
